title: Worry (1U162)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, the opponent must choose to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.
Lore:	”'One by one, regardless of their strength to good or evil… they fell.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Game text is a clarification.
